name: Farm Crush 2020 - Match Puzzle
description:
Welcome to the magical farm🌽 lands and enjoy the fun by farm crush 2020!😘

Various of fruits and vegetables🥦 in your farm have been enchanted, Will you save them and help to fight the evil forces🎃? Start your fight by playing hundreds of addictive levels. Match three or more crops of the same color🎨 by your fingers and make the blocks crush by combining special boosters🚀.

You can play with your Facebook friends and players all over the world in farm crush. Try your best to get high scores and more reputations in tournament🎯!

HOW TO PLAY：
●Swap to match 3 or more same crops in a line to crush them.
●Match 4 crops in a line to create the direction crop bombs.
●Match 5 in T or L to create cross or diamond crop bombs
●Find different kinds of powerful combos is the key to get high scores.

FEATURES:
●🆓Farm Crush 2020 is completely free to play!
●🍎Explore amazing farm lands and collect various crops to challenge the levels!
●🎉Over 700 fun&challenging levels and we are still updating more and more levels!
●😄Lots of FREE boosters are available everyday!
●⭐️It is easy to play but difficult to master!
●🥇Challenge other players from all over the world in unique tournament events!
●⏳No time limited or Internet limited, play it whenever and wherever you want!

Are you ready to save your cute crops? Let’s get started!😍
